template_info.name: Water-Type Masters
template_info.description: A versatile water-type team with excellent coverage and defensive synergy
template_info.usage_notes: Water types offer great versatility and bulk. Use Rain Dance to boost water moves and support Thunder accuracy.

pokemon.name: blastoise
pokemon.strategy: Bulky water starter with excellent coverage
pokemon.tips: Use Rain Dance to power up Hydro Pump and help teammates

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.strategy: Ultimate special wall with team support
pokemon.tips: Heal Bell removes status from your entire team - invaluable support

pokemon.name: gyarados
pokemon.tips: Dragon Dance boosts both attack and speed - sweep after setup

pokemon.name: starmie
pokemon.tips: Excellent speed tier - often moves first to secure knockouts

pokemon.name: vaporeon
pokemon.strategy: Extremely bulky special tank with status spreading
pokemon.tips: Massive HP allows it to tank almost any special attack

pokemon.name: golduck
pokemon.strategy: Versatile attacker with psychic typing advantages
pokemon.tips: Can surprise with physical moves when expected to be special
